pullRequest.title: Separate Alluxio related documentation
pullRequest.bodyText:
Since we are adding caching docs as a separate document . the Alluxio docs should sit side by side with it and not be in the main Hive connector docs. We plan to pull that long document apart even more in the future but this is necessary now since we have built in caching support.
Related to #4227

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,96 @@
+===========================================
+Hive Connector Storage Caching with Alluxio
+===========================================
+
+Presto can read and write tables stored in the `Alluxio Data Orchestration
+System <https://www.alluxio.io/?utm_source=prestosql&utm_medium=prestodocs>`_,
+leveraging Alluxio's distributed block-level read/write caching functionality.
+The tables must be created in the Hive metastore with the ``alluxio://``
+location prefix (see `Running Apache Hive with Alluxio
+<https://docs.alluxio.io/os/user/2.1/en/compute/Hive.html?utm_source=prestosql&utm_medium=prestodocs>`_
+for details and examples).
+
+Presto queries will then transparently retrieve and cache files or objects from
+a variety of disparate storage systems including HDFS and S3.
+
+.. contents::
+    :local:
+    :backlinks: none
+    :depth: 1
+
+Alluxio client-side configuration

nodes.bodyText: I don't think we need the index since the page is short (fits on single screen)
